content: Sporting event delegation [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) competed at the [1984 Summer Olympics](/wiki/1984_Summer_Olympics) in [Los Angeles](/wiki/Los_Angeles,_California), [United States](/wiki/United_States). The nation returned to the Olympic Games after participating in the [American-led boycott of the 1980 Summer Olympics](/wiki/American-led_boycott_of_the_1980_Summer_Olympics). ## Results and competitors by event ### Swimming at the 1984 Summer Olympics **Men's 100m Freestyle** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong) - Heat — 51.66 - B-Final — 51.09 (→ 9th place) - [Oon Jin-Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin-Gee) - Heat — 54.17 (→ did not advance, 42nd place) **Men's 100m Backstroke** - [David Lim Fong Jock](/wiki/David_Lim_Fong_Jock) - Heat — 1:00.65 (→ did not advance, 29th place) **Men's 100m Breaststroke** - [Oon Jin Teik](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Teik) - Heat — 1:09.23 (→ did not advance, 42nd place) **Men's 100m Butterfly** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong) - Heat — 56.61 (→ did not advance, 27th place) **Men's 4 × 100 m Freestyle Relay** - [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong), [Oon Jin Teik](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Teik), [David Lim Fong Jock](/wiki/David_Lim_Fong_Jock), [Oon Jin-Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin-Gee) - Heat — 3:34.63 (→ did not advance, 17th place) **Men's 4 × 100 m Medley Relay** - [David Lim Fong Jock](/wiki/David_Lim_Fong_Jock), [Oon Jin Teik](/wiki/Oon_Jin_Teik), [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong), and [Oon Jin-Gee](/wiki/Oon_Jin-Gee) - Heat — 4:00.07 (→ did not advance, 16th place) - Official Olympic Reports - sports-reference This [1984 Olympics](/wiki/1984_Summer_Olympics)-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
title: Singapore at the 1984 Summer Olympics
